凒字的基本解释

凒
ái
古同“皑”。

凒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ái］
［《集韻》魚開切，平咍，疑。］
［《集韻》魚衣切，平微，疑。］
［《集韻》吾回切，平灰，疑。］
(1)同“皚”。
(2)见“凗凒”。

凒字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【冫字部】　凒； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页133第10
【集韻】【韻會】?魚衣切，音沂。【博雅】凗凒，霜雪也。【楚辭·九思】霜雪兮凗凒。又【韻會】或作皚溰。又【集韻】吾回切，音敳。義同。

凒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
凒字的起名意思

暂无。

凒
Basic explanation of words
凒
ái
Ancient with "white".
凒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ái］
["Jiyun" fish cut open, flat swallow, suspicious. ]
["Jiyun" fish clothes are cut, flat and suspicious. ]
["Ji Yun" I cut back, flat gray, suspicious. ]
(1) Same as "ai".
(2) See "凗凒".
凒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [冫字部] 　凒; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 133-10
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Fish clothes cut, sound Yi. 【Bo Ya】Awesome, frosty and snowy. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Thoughts] The frost and snow are screaming. Also 【Yunhui】or as Aiming. [Jiyun] I cut back again, and sounded. The same meaning.
